original_text: And there went out the king of Sodom, and the king of Gomorrah, and the king of Admah, and the king of Zeboiim, and the king of Bela (the same is Zoar;) and they joined battle with them in the vale of Siddim;
korean_text: 소돔 왕과 고모라 왕과 아드마 왕과 스보임 왕과 벨라 곧 소알 왕이 나와서 싯딤 골짜기에서 그들과 전쟁을 위하여 진을 쳤더니

sentences.original_text: And there went out the king of Sodom
and the king of Bela (the same is Zoar)
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 벨라 왕(이는 소알과 같음)도 나아갔고

sentences.original_text: and they joined battle with them
